mapper.select: SELECT i.investment_code, i.member_id, i.store_code, i.investment_request_judge_code, i.total_category_code, i.member_id_seller, i.investment_image, i.investment_like, i.investment_achievement_money, i.search_count, i.invest_count, i.securities_classification, i.investment_display_date, i.investment_reg_date, i.investment_report, i.basic_fee, i.contract_fee_rate, i.contract_file, i.invest_judge_situation, i.invest_achievement_percent, i.investment_subject, i.investment_amount, DATEDIFF(investment_deadline, CURDATE()) AS investmentDeadlineCnt, i.investment_image, i.investment_company FROM investment AS i

SELECT i.investment_code, i.member_id, i.store_code, i.investment_request_judge_code, i.total_category_code, i.member_id_seller, i.investment_image, i.investment_like, i.investment_achievement_money, i.search_count, i.invest_count, i.securities_classification, i.investment_display_date, i.investment_reg_date, i.investment_report, i.basic_fee, i.contract_fee_rate, i.contract_file, i.invest_judge_situation, i.invest_achievement_percent, i.investment_subject, i.investment_amount, i.investment_image, i.investment_company FROM investment AS i WHERE i.investment_code = #{projectCode}

SELECT i.investment_code AS investmentCode, i.member_id_seller AS memberId, i.investment_subject AS investmentSubject, i.investment_image AS investmentImage, i.investment_like AS investmentLike, i.investment_amount AS investmentAmount, i.investment_achievement_money AS investmentAchievementMoney, i.invest_achievement_percent AS investAchievementPercent, i.investment_company AS investmentCompany, i.search_count AS searchCount, i.invest_count AS investCount, i.securities_classification AS securitiesClassification, i.investment_reg_date AS investmentRegDate, i.investment_deadline AS investmentDeadline, i.investment_report AS investmentReport, DATEDIFF(investment_deadline, CURDATE()) AS investmentDeadlineCnt, ic.investment_content_code AS investmentContentCode, ic.project_introduction AS projectIntroduction, ic.market_analysis AS marketAnalysis, ic.major_financial_information AS majorFinancialInformation, ic.risk AS risk, ic.major_manpower AS majorManpower, ic.patent_award_details AS patentAwardDetails, ic.etc_invest_content AS etcInvestContent, ir.investment_request_judge_code AS investmentRequestJudgeCode, ir.company_business_type_code AS companyBusinessTypeCode, ir.stock_number AS stockNumber, ir.issue_stock_number AS issueStockNumber, ir.investment_request_content AS investmentRequestContent FROM investment AS i INNER JOIN investment_content AS ic ON i.investment_code = ic.investment_code INNER JOIN investment_request_judge AS ir ON i.investment_request_judge_code = ir.investment_request_judge_code WHERE i.investment_code = #{investmentCode}

SELECT investment_code, invest_achievement_percent, investment_subject, investment_amount, investment_deadline, DATEDIFF(investment_deadline, CURDATE()) AS investmentDeadlineCnt, investment_image, investment_company, securities_classification, invest_judge_situation FROM investment
investment_deadline >= CURDATE()
CURDATE() > investment_deadline
AND securities_classification = '주식'
AND securities_classification = '채권'
ORDER BY invest_achievement_percent DESC
ORDER BY investment_reg_date DESC
ORDER BY investment_like DESC
ORDER BY investment_amount DESC
ORDER BY investmentDeadlineCnt ASC
ORDER BY invest_achievement_percent DESC
/* 업종 조회 */ SELECT c.company_business_type_code AS companyBusinessTypeCode, c.member_id AS memberId, c.business_type AS businessType FROM company_business_type AS c

/* 자본시장법 범위충족기준 조회 */ SELECT l.law_satistify_code AS lawSatistifyCode, l.member_id AS memberId, l.law_satistify_reason AS lawSatistifyReason, l.law_satistify_whether AS lawSatistifyWhether, l.code_reg_day AS codeRegDay FROM law_satistify_reason AS l

/* 공고 내 증권발행 조건(주식) */ SELECT s.securities_issuance_stock_code AS securitiesIssuanceStockCode, s.member_id AS memberId, s.investment_code AS investmentCode, s.corp_value AS corpValue, s.invest_min_cost AS investMinCost, s.stock_price AS stockPrice, s.securities_classification AS securitiesClassification, s.face_value AS faceValue, s.stock_number AS stockNumber, s.issue_stock_number AS issueStockNumber, s.issue_allotment_share_ratio AS issueAllotmentShareRatio, s.subscription_allocation_ranking AS subscriptionAllocationRanking, s.stock_type AS stockType, s.subscription_date AS subscriptionDate, s.subscription_deadline AS subscriptionDeadline, s.payment_date AS paymentDate, s.estimated_issue_date AS estimatedIssueDate, s.allocation_confirmation_date AS allocationConfirmationDate, s.receiving_date_of_securities AS receivingDateOfSecurities, s.redemption_start_date AS redemptionStartDate, s.redemption_end_date AS redemptionEndDate, s.repayment_rate AS repaymentRate, s.min_dividend_rate AS minDividendRate, s.conversion_start_date AS conversionStartDate, s.conversion_end_date AS conversionEndDate, s.conversion_condition AS conversionCondition, s.voting_right AS votingRight FROM securities_issuance_stock AS s WHERE s.investment_code = #{investmentCode};

/* 공고 내 증권발행 조건(채권) */ SELECT s.securities_issuance_bond_code AS securitiesIssuanceBondCode, s.member_id AS memberId, s.investment_code AS investmentCode, s.interest_rate AS interestRate, s.invest_min_cost AS investMinCost, s.bond_price AS bondPrice, s.securities_classification AS securitiesClassification, s.maturity AS maturity, s.subscription_allocation_ranking AS subscriptionAllocationRanking, s.bond_type AS bondType, s.subscription_date AS subscriptionDate, s.subscription_deadline AS subscriptionDeadline, s.maturity_date AS maturityDate, s.estimated_issue_date AS estimatedIssueDate, s.allocation_confirmation_date AS allocationConfirmationDate, s.payment_date AS paymentDate, s.account_to_be_issued AS accountToBeIssued FROM securities_issuance_bond AS s WHERE s.investment_code = #{investmentCode};

SELECT news_code AS newsCode, project_code AS projectCode, news_subject AS newsSubject, news_content AS newsContent, news_datetime AS newsDatetime, news_modify_datetime AS newsModifyDatetime, news_delete_datetime AS newsDeleteDatetime, news_display AS newsDisplay FROM news WHERE project_code = #{investmentCode};
mapper.insert:
SELECT ( CASE WHEN COUNT(comment_datetime) = 0 THEN CONCAT('com_', CURDATE()+0, '_0001') WHEN COUNT(comment_datetime) > 9999 THEN CONCAT('com_', CURDATE()+0, '_', COUNT(comment_datetime)+1) ELSE CONCAT('com_', CURDATE()+0, '_', LPAD(COUNT(comment_datetime)+1, 4, '0')) END ) AS investCommentCode FROM invest_comment WHERE DATE_FORMAT(comment_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE();
INSERT INTO invest_comment (invest_comment_code, member_id, investment_code, member_name, comment_content, comment_datetime, comment_modify_datetime, comment_delete_datetime, comment_code, comment_class) VALUE (#{investCommentCode}, #{memberId}, #{investmentCode}, #{memberName}, #{commentContent}, NOW(), NULL, NULL, NULL, 'comment');
mapper.select: SELECT i.invest_comment_code AS investCommentCode, i.member_id AS memberId, i.investment_code AS investmentCode, i.member_name AS memberName, i.comment_content AS commentContent, i.comment_datetime AS commentDatetime, i.comment_modify_datetime AS commentModifyDatetime, i.comment_delete_datetime AS commentDeleteDatetime, i.comment_code AS commentCode, i.comment_class AS commentClass FROM invest_comment AS i WHERE i.investment_code = #{investmentCode};
